content.text: C# How To Add Two Numbers
Learn how to add two numbers in C#:
content.html: Learn how to add two numbers in C#:

content.code:
int
x
=

5
;


int
y
=

6
;


int
sum
=
x
+
y
;

Console
.
WriteLine
(
sum
)
;

// Print the sum of x + y
content.code_html:
int x = 5;
int y = 6;
int sum = x + y;
Console.WriteLine(sum); // Print the sum of x + y
